name: Post Plants
description:
This Game was made for the 33rd GDL Game Jam hosted by Violent Crumble.

DESCRIPTION

Post-Plant is a farming game all about delayed gratification. Collect plants and sell them before they die, or use dead plants as compost to grow higher quality produce! This is your chance to embrace your inner countryside dweller and get your hands virtually dirty but watch out for critters and pests! They could ruin the peace of life on the farm. 

CONTROLS

Walk: WASD, Arrows, Left Joystick

Run: Left Shift

Interact: E

Open Shop: B

CREDITS

Programming: Imated, APΞIRON

Art: PineTyto

Music: Fogheart

Narrative: Wheelsgr
